mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xiaolu_excel.excel_callcustomer(call_customer_id, datasource_area, datasource_building, datasource_type, customer_name, customer_tel, call_time, call_salesman, feedback, intention_level, intention_building, visit_time, visit_building, customer_situation, deal_time, deal_building, deal_roomnum, remark, block_flag, create_time) VALUES (#{callCustomerId}, #{datasourceArea}, #{datasourceBuilding}, #{datasourceType}, #{customerName}, #{customerTel},#{callTime}, #{callSalesman}, #{feedback}, #{intentionLevel}, #{intentionBuilding}, #{visitTime}, #{visitBuilding}, #{customerSituation}, #{dealTime}, #{dealBuilding}, #{dealRoomnum}, #{remark}, #{blockFlag}, #{createAt})
